# Repository Structure

This repository contains both a Python web application and an NPM package.

## ğŸ“ What's Included on GitHub

### âœ… Essential Files (Visible)
- **README.md** - Main project documentation
- **LICENSE** - MIT License
- **Core application files** - Python Flask app and CLI
- **Essential documentation** - QUICKSTART, DEPLOYMENT, CONTRIBUTING, etc.
- **Configuration files** - requirements.txt, setup.py, etc.

### ğŸ“š Documentation (Organized)
- **docs/** - All project documentation
- **docs/development/** - Development guides

### ğŸ”§ Scripts (Organized)
- **scripts/** - Utility scripts

### ğŸ“¦ NPM Package (Self-contained)
- **npm-package/** - Complete NPM package
  - Source code
  - Tests
  - Documentation
  - Configuration

### âŒ Not Included (Gitignored)
- `node_modules/` - Dependencies (install with npm install)
- `lib/` - Build outputs (generated during build)
- `*.log` - Log files
- `.DS_Store` - OS files
- `source_pdfs/`, `final_pdfs/`, `logs/` - Runtime directories
- Temporary documentation files
- IDE configuration files
